document.full_text: "three cups of tea" author greg mortenson's montana-based charity is being examined by the state's attorney general, after a "60 minutes" broadcast raised questions about it, officials said on tuesday.
document.title: montana opens inquiry into "three cups of tea" charity
lines_and_colors: "three cups of tea" author greg mortenson's montana-based charity is being examined by the state's attorney general, after a "60 minutes" broadcast raised questions about it, officials said on tuesday.
